errors.headers.acceptLanguageHeaderInvalid: Accept-Language header must be set to 'en' or 'ar'
errors.headers.xClientBuildNumberHeaderInvalid: X-Client-Build-Number header must be set to an integer
errors.headers.xClientEnvironmentHeaderInvalid: X-Client-Environment header must be set to 'development', 'staging' or 'production'
errors.headers.xClientNameHeaderInvalid: X-Client-Name header must be between 1 and 1024 characters
errors.headers.xClientVersionHeaderInvalid: X-Client-Version header must be a valid semantic version
errors.headers.xDeviceHeadersDependenciesRequir: X-Device-ID, X-Device-Manufacturer, X-Device-Model-Identifier and X-Device-Model-Name headers must be set together
errors.headers.xDeviceIdHeaderInvalid: X-Device-ID header must be between 1 and 1024 characters
errors.headers.xDeviceManufacturerHeaderInvalid: X-Device-Manufacturer header must be between 1 and 1024 characters
errors.headers.xDeviceModelIdentifierHeaderInva: X-Device-Model-Identifier header must be between 1 and 1024 characters
errors.headers.xDeviceModelNameHeaderInvalid: X-Device-Model-Name header must be between 1 and 1024 characters
errors.headers.xGeoHeadersDependenciesRequired: X-Geo-Latitude and X-Geo-Longitude headers must be set together
errors.headers.xGeoLatitudeHeaderInvalid: X-Geo-Latitude header must be set to a valid number between -90 and 90
errors.headers.xGeoLongitudeHeaderInvalid: X-Geo-Longitude header must be set to a valid number between -180 and 180
errors.headers.xRequestIdHeaderInvalid: X-Request-ID header must be set to a valid UUID
errors.headers.xRequestTimeHeaderInvalid: X-Request-Time header must be set to a valid iso datetime
errors.payloadTooLarge: Request payload too large. Maximum size allowed is {maxSize} KB.
errors.requestTimeOff: Request time is out of acceptable range
errors.titleTooLong: Title must be between 1 and 150 characters
errors.bodyTooLong: Body must be between 1 and 300 characters
errors.language.invalid: Language must be set to 'ar' or 'en'
errors.firebaseChannelNotFound: Firebase app for this channel not found
errors.configurationError: Missing configuration Options. If using process.env variables, please mark useProcess as 'true'. Otherwise, please provide .env, JSON file.
